storage

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • storage.FileManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StorageManager<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferedFileManager

    public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements StorageManager<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Object>
    A FileManager manages a storage space using the slotted page format.
    Author:
    Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)
